description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to protect children on the move in particular UASC despite challenging political and COVID-19 context; a total of; 40,129 people and 2,806 children received protective immigration services due to UNICEF intervention, 1,743 children and 400 caregivers received psychosocial kits in Tumbes, and CP protocol established for UASC with partners in Tumbes, capacity of child protection service workforce of MIMP and immigration strengthened by institutionalized training and coaching at national and migration affected norther border area. | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/12/2021
